info.description:
One night, you're working at your job, about to close shop when you find a fat person stuffing their face of free food. But when you try to stop them, they bite you and waddle away! The next night, you're brushing your teeth when your stomach growls and you pass out...the next morning, you find yourself in shattered clothes, covered in gobs of food. Now every full moon (Both the natural and your own), you will transform into a were-fatso!

Rules:

1: A person is cursed when they're bitten or licked by a were-fatso. You change every time you see a full moon, either the one in the sky or a fully exposed butt.
2: All the calories you devour only affect your were-fatso form, not your normal one. You become your normal size, but when you change into a were-fatso, you become the size you were there currently.
3: A were-fatso is driven away by health food and tofu.
4: Leave the main character's gender be amquitous (IE don't state if its a guy or a girl). This makes it more fair for everyone
